  • Method Details

    • getUserByEmail

      public Optional<User> getUserByEmail(String email)
      This method retrieve a user from DB according to its email.
      Parameters:
      email - is the user's email to be found in DB.
      Returns:
      is the optional saved user from db (contains id) that corresponds to this email.

    • save

      public User save(User user)
      This method saves a user into DB.
      Parameters:
      user - is the user to be saved.
      Returns:
      is the saved user from db (contains id).

    • existsByEmail

      public boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      This method returns the existence of a user in the DB according to its email.
      Parameters:
      email - is the email of the user you want to find the existence.
      Returns:
      true if a user exists with this email, false if it does not.

    • createAndSaveLocalUser

      public User createAndSaveLocalUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String password, Role role)
      This method creates a new user with its new pay my buddy account
      Parameters:
      firstName - is the first name of the user you want to create
      lastName - is the last name of the user you want to create
      email - is the email name of the user you want to create
      password - is the password of the user you want to create
      Returns:
      returns the user object instantiated in the database

    • makeATransaction

      public Transaction makeATransaction(User fromUser, User toUser, @Nullable String description, float amount, boolean applyFees)
      This method make a transaction between two paymybuddy accounts
      Parameters:
      fromUser - it is the user that pays.
      toUser - it is the user that receive the money.
      description - it is an optional description of the transaction.
      amount - it is the amount of the transaction.
      applyFees - it is a boolean if you want to apply fees
      Returns:
      return a transaction object.

    • makeABankTransaction

      public BankTransaction makeABankTransaction(User user, String iban, String swiftCode, @Nullable String description, float amount)
      This method creates and saves a bank transaction into the database. A bank transaction is a transaction of money from a paymybuddy account to an external account.
      Parameters:
      user - is the paymybuddy user on which the money is being taken from.
      iban - is the iban number according to the ISO 13616.
      swiftCode - is the swift code according to the ISO 9362:1994.
      description - is a description of the transaction.
      amount - is the amount of the transaction.
      Returns:

    • getAllPagedTransactionFromUser

      public Paged<Transaction> getAllPagedTransactionFromUser(int pageNumber, int size, User user)
      This method is used to get all transaction in a paged object.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - is the number of the current page you want to extract as a list from the paged object.
      size - is the size of the page(list) you want to extract from the paged object.
      user - is the user concerned by the extraction.
      Returns:
      a paged object.

    • delete

      public void delete(User user)
      This method deletes a user from database.
      Parameters:
      user - is the user you want to delete in DB.

    • makeAccountCredit

      public AccountCredit makeAccountCredit(User user, float amount, String description, String creditCardNumber, String crypto, String expirationDate)
      This method creates and save an accountCredit object into the database and credit the account from the amount detailed in the method.
      Parameters:
      user - is the user on which the money is added.
      amount - is the amount added to the account.
      description - is a description for this transfert.
      creditCardNumber - is the credit card number with which you credit you paymybuddy account.
      crypto - is the cryptogram number of this credit card.
      expirationDate - is the expiration date of this credit card.
      Returns:
      an AccountCredit object saved in the database.

    • getUserFromPrincipal

      public User getUserFromPrincipal(Principal loggedInUser) throws Exception
      This method returns the associated user from database, according to a specific principal (connected user in WebUI)
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - is the principal object corresponding to the WebUI connected user.
      Returns:
      the associated user from database.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • createAndSaveOAuth2UserInDb

      private User createAndSaveOAuth2UserInDb(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String OAuth2Id, ClientRegistrationIdName oAuthProvider)
      This method creates and saves a principal user that sign hanks to OAuth2 into the DB if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      firstName - is the firstname of the user to be saved.
      lastName - is the lastname of the user to be saved.
      email - is the email of the user to be saved.
      OAuth2Id - is the OAuth2 id of the user to be saved.
      oAuthProvider - is the client registration id name of the user to be saved. (i.e. : Google, Github...)
      Returns:
      a user properly saved in database.

    • getUserFromUsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken

      private User getUserFromUsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken(Principal loggedInUser)
      This method retrieves a user into DB a principal made from a username and a password authentication token.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - is the principal to be retrieved in DB.
      Returns:
      is the user object from DB concerned by the principal.

    • getUserFromOAuth2

      private User getUserFromOAuth2(Principal loggedInUser) throws Exception
      This method is a helper method to determine how to retrieve a user into DB from different type of OAuth2 principal WebUI users.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - is the principal to be retrieved in DB.
      Returns:
      is the user object from DB concerned by the principal.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getUserFromOAuth2GitHub

      private User getUserFromOAuth2GitHub(Principal loggedInUser)
      This method gets the Database User thanks to the loggedIn user principal information's of an OAuth2 GitHub account.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - It is a principal object, supposed to be an OAuth2AuthenticationToken
      Returns:
      the user from local Db corresponding to the GitHub account used during OAuth2 process

    • getUserFromOAuth2Google

      private User getUserFromOAuth2Google(Principal loggedInUser)
      This method gets the Database User thanks to the loggedIn user principal information's of an OAuth google account.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - It is a principal object, supposed to be an OAuth2AuthenticationToken
      Returns:
      the user from local Db corresponding to the Google account used during OAuth2 process

    • getDbUserByGithubID

      private Optional<User> getDbUserByGithubID(String githubId)
      Recover a user into db according to its GitHub id.
      Parameters:
      githubId - is the GitHub id of the user you try to recover.
      Returns:
      an optional of the user you are looking for.

    • getDbUserByGoogleId

      private Optional<User> getDbUserByGoogleId(String googleId)
      Recover a user into db according to its google id.
      Parameters:
      googleId - is the Google id of the user you try to recover.
      Returns:
      an optional of the user you are looking for.
